item.title: Jekyll with fenced code blocks
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: While hacking up some markdown files to use under Jekyll I hit a weird issue where code blocks written with triple ticks (aka fenced code blocks) wouldn’t render correctly. When writing markdown, I like to express code blocks using the fenced-code-blocks syntax. I’m just getting up to speed with using Jekyll and after reading their documentation I found I could use their highlight liquid tag, but I just didn’t care for the look and feel of that.
